```{r}
kcat <- 320
km <- 17000
enzyme_conc = 0.000095
t = 60
alcohol_conc = 160000
moles_enzyme = (enzyme_conc * 100)/1000
vmax = moles_enzyme * kcat * 4
```

```{r}
velocity <- function(s){
  v = (vmax * s)/(km + s)
  return(v)
}

new_s <- function(s, v){
  mole_alc = s * 0.003
  mole_alc = mole_alc - v
  s = mole_alc/0.003
  return(s)
}
velocity(alcohol_conc)
new_s(alcohol_conc, vmax)
new_s(alcohol_conc, velocity(alcohol_conc))
```


```{r}
t = 60
s = alcohol_conc
while(t >= 0){
  v = velocity(s)
  print(c(t, v))
  s = new_s(c(s, v))
  t = t - 1
}
```
